---
title: Workflow Canvas
description: Build workflows with the visual canvas.
---

The canvas is the primary workspace for building workflow agents.

## Key areas

- **Node tray**: browse available nodes and tools.
- **Canvas toolbar**: save, run, and toggle visibility options.
- **Property panel**: configure selected node properties.
- **Code panel**: inspect the underlying workflow JSON.

## Productivity features

- Auto-save at intervals for active workflows
- Undo/redo history tracking
- Alignment guides when dragging nodes
- Quick-fit and auto-layout controls
